| History                 = Ten thousand years ago, the Tribe of the Moon were the super-heroes of their time. They battled many foes, such as [[Ice Devils]], the [[Creatures of the Caves]], the [[Sharks from Beyond Time]], [[Deviants (Race)|Lemurian Deviants]] and the [[Dimension Giants]].{{r|Alpha Flight #83}}

Their most famous battle was when they were led by their member, Talisman (an earlier self of the current Talisman), against [[Llan|Llan, the Sorcerer]]. Willow-Dancer was slain in the battle, but Llan was defeated.{{r|Alpha Flight #83}}
